articles.description: The bank's asset quality improved significantly with its gross non-performing assets (NPAs) declining to 4.90 percent of the gross advances as of September 30, 2023, against 16.51 percent at the end of September 2022.
articles.content: IDBI Bank on Saturday reported a 60 percent rise in net profit to Rs 1,323 crore for the second quarter ended September 30 on the back of a fall in bad loans. The private sector lender controlled by … [+812 chars]

articles.title: Sterling and Wilson Renewable Energy Sep quarter net loss narrows to Rs 54.51 cr - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Sterling and Wilson Renewable Energy Ltd reported a reduced net loss of Rs 54.51 crore for the September 2023 quarter, attributing it to increased income.
